        Food & Drink

        Food & Drink at Phoenix

        It isn't a trip to the cinema without something delicious to enjoy while you watch – so pick up something to eat and drink from us! Upstairs, our beautiful bar serves a large range of wines, spirits and bottled beers, and provides a perfect place to relax before or after watching a great movie. You can also grab a treat from our kiosks. We've got plenty of popcorn (of course), hot and cold drinks, beer and wine, and a range of delicious snacks, all hand-picked by our team of dedicated foodies. 

        • Find Out More

        Accessibility

        We take accessibility very seriously. To help plan your visit, we've outlined all the facilities we offer for customers with disabilities. Have a question?

        Call our dedicated accessibility helpline:
        020 7294 7908
